casebody.data:
SAMUEL I. HUNT and PETER R. WARNER, Exrs., &c., et al., Respondents, v. PETER LAWLESS, Appellant.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Fbeedman and Teuax, JJ.

Decided April 4, 1881. Appeal from judgment entered upon the report of a referee. Lewis A. Brigham, attorney, and George V. N. Baldwin, of counsel, for appellant. Smith & Woodward, attorneys, and William, Fullerton, of counsel, for respondent. Pee Cueiam.

— The judgment and order are .affirmed, with costs, on the opinion of the referee.
